item.title: Long Weekend Wanderlust: Charleston, SC - BrokeSnob
item.description:
Long Weekend Wanderlust: Charleston, SC - BrokeSnob

I look for a few things in cities: good food, good architecture, and beautiful landscape are right up there. So Charleston, SC is, unsurprisingly, high on my list. (How have I not been yet?? It's a 2 hour flight from me!) Anyway, here are some of the things I'll be trying out once I finally make it there.

item.title: Girl Crush: Jewelry Designer Madhuri Parson - BrokeSnob
item.description:
Girl Crush: Jewelry Designer Madhuri Parson - BrokeSnob

I met jewelry designer Madhuri Parson about a year and a half ago at a Flora Nuit event where the hostess had us featuring our lingerie and Madhuri showing her stunning collection. Lingerie and jewelry - pretty good pairing, right? I swooned over all of Madhuri's pieces and (obviously) started following her on Instagram.

item.title: The Perfect Lingerie Party
item.description:
The Perfect Lingerie Party

Are you familiar with lifestyle and entertaining blogger Camille Styles ? If not, you should become so. Immediately. As a friend of mine said recently, "I want to live in this blog." So when my company, , had the opportunity to work with her to throw the perfect lingerie party, we grabbed it.

item.description:
Weekly Wanderlust: San Miguel de Allende

About 170 miles outside of Mexico City lies San Miguel de Allende. The city's history dates back to 1542 when it played an important role as a hub...

croatia

i've been dying to go there forever, but haven't made it yet. when i finally do get there, this is where i'd like to stay... Images via Architectural Digest, Full House and Coco Male...

item.title: Flora Nuit x Yummie

item.title: Carolina Herrera: Spring 2016 RTW - BrokeSnob
item.description:
Carolina Herrera: Spring 2016 RTW - BrokeSnob

I saw Carolina Herrera in person a few days ago and, unsurprisingly, she was pretty flawless. So it's also no surprise that the Spring RTW collection she showed at New York Fashion Week a few days ago was as well.

item.title: Weekly Wanderlust: Vienna, Austria - BrokeSnob
item.description:
Weekly Wanderlust: Vienna, Austria - BrokeSnob

It's starting to feel like Christmas in NYC, so our Weekly Wanderlust is a place known for its Christmas markets - Vienna, Austria! It's also known for coffee, wine, psychoanalysis, amazing architecture - all my favorite things. Here are the places I'll be checking out when I visit.
